page.title: 12EVENTS SHOW & HIGHLAND GAMES
page.content: {SHOW:}The annual show attracts lots of entries from around the district. It has many sections for animals and for craft. Every show has a Show Queen who is picked by a Scottish celebrity. The show has side shows and exhibitions. The Show is the largest in Sutherland and attracts large crowds. {GAMES:}The Dornoch Highland Games are held annualy. They have side-shows and traditional events such as tossing the caber, hammer throwing, and tug-o-war. There are races, cycling and dancing. {OTHER EVENTS:}Dornoch has a gala week in the summer. Events include football tournaments, Dornoch's strongest man competition and there are also discos and fun-runs. The Dornoch Pipe Band plays on Saturday evenings during the summer for tourists and locals. During the year many events are held in the school such as concerts and lectures.
